**⚠️ IMPORTANT: Do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

This issue template is for **internal use only**. Please report security vulnerabilities through one of the following methods:

## Preferred Method

**Email:** security@arxos.io

## What to Include

- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce (if applicable)
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if available)

## Response Timeline

- **Initial Response**: Within 48 hours
- **Status Update**: Within 7 days
- **Resolution**: Depends on severity

## More Information

See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for our full security policy.

---

**If you're seeing this as a public issue, please delete it and email security@arxos.io instead.**
